channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Countdown Block
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Countdown Block

item.title: CVE-2021-24633|2024-08-03T19:35:20.225Z -- unknown -- countdown%20block
item.description: The Countdown Block WordPress plugin before 1.1.2 does not have authorisation in the eb_write_block_css AJAX action, which allows any authenticated user, such as Subscriber, to modify post contents displayed to users.
